About Me

Hello there, I’m a Computer Science student at Universidade Federal do Paraná, and I’ll be graduating soon!

I’m interested in robotics, computer vision and machine learning.

I’m part of the Yapira UFPR Robotics Team. Watch our computer vision-based line follower robot complete its first track at RCX 2022:
